headline: FDA Fast-Tracks Two Merck (MRK) Drugs With Blockbuster Potential
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) is included among the 14 Best Pharma Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On December 17, the US Food and Drug Administration moved to fast-track reviews of two experimental Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) drugs with multibillion-dollar potential, according to internal documents seen by Reuters. Merck’s cholesterol pill enlicitide decanoate […]
